name: 20 minute scrunchie
notes: scrunchies are fun hair accessories back from the 90's! most of us remember these awesome poufy hair ties, and some of us used to make them too! join in on rekindling this updated craft and fashion trend with this fast and easy pattern for a crocheted scrunchie! all it takes is 20 short minutes and one elastic hair tie. grab some scrap yarn and in no time you'll have whipped up your very own totally awesome scrunchie! you'll be amazed just how simple it is!
